scripts.dev: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js . --listen
scripts.build-demo: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/demo/ --build index
scripts.build-empty: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/empty/ --build index
scripts.build-readme: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/demo/ --output . --build readme
scripts.build: npm run build-demo; npm run build-empty; npm run build-readme
